subject: Possible EVP - Need Opinions
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
Hi All,

This was captured during a Ghost Hunt last weekend at Golden Hill Cemetery
in Lakewood, CO. You will hear my daughter ask a question, and then there
seems to be a response.

Please let me know if if you can hear it, and if so, what you think it might
be saying.

Thanks!
April
